rooms.description: Spacious entrance with natural lighting and open space design.
Minimalist living area with floor-to-ceiling windows to the garden.
Separate dining space adjacent to the kitchen.
Open-concept kitchen with integrated dining bar.
Transition area connecting to the garden.
Modern en-suite bathroom with Vastu-aligned water element placement.
Storage and utility area for appliances.

openings.description: Main entrance door with glass accents to let in ample light.
Large window facing the garden and sunrise direction, aligning with Vastu principles.
Window to ensure cross ventilation in the living area.
Balcony overlooking the garden, designed for relaxation and Vastu positive energy.
